name: facade
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, this move has double power.
short_effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

flavor_text.x_y: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.
